content: 5 cm k2tog around decreases 5 sts 5 sts remaining ending after round 1 break yarn and pull it through the 5 remaining sts note you ll note that the second part of the decrease rounds says see notes section at the to work the stitches in pattern since you re working end for tips on blocking decreases across textured fabric the ks and ps will change and attaching a pom pom after each decrease round it s important to keep an eye on your fabric aka read your knitting to maintain the clean lines of the ks and ps as they converge toward the point there will be places with 4-6 k sts in a row as decreases angle toward the five k columns that go all the way to the tip this is intentional it may look odd as you re knitting but it looks great when it s done this pattern may not be fabric it doesn t need aggressive blocking around the brim instead while it s drop me a note and i ll do my best to help you out damp i suggest gently tugging the hat from brim to pointed jessica@insomniaknitting com tip to emphasize the length before letting it dry attaching a pom pom since the pointed tip of this hat isn t really finished until it gets its pom pom you may want to leave the tip open a smidge more than you might otherwise to make attaching the pom pom easier this is especially true if you intend to make it removable so you can wash the hat later there are a few
